history.content:
On Friday March 29, 2019, campus plumbing department will be replacing a main water valve serving Soda Hall's domestic water supply; 
I understand the Shut Down of domestic plumbing will affect the water supply for all building bathrooms, toilets, sinks, kitchenettes and drinking fountains; no running water will be available. 
Soda Hall will be closed to all building occupants, except for campus Facilities plumbers, and maintenance personnel.  
Please make other arrangements on Friday March 29, 2019, please do not enter Soda Hall.
history.subject: Soda Hall Closed on Friday of Spring Break
